name: SPICE
description: SPICE is a community-based platform for data-driven population health. SPICE leverages clinical algorithms to screen, refer, and manage patients based on clinical risk, transforming care delivery from reactive to proactive while linking community-based work bi-directionally with health facilities and health systems

sdgs.relevance:
The SPICE platform has direct relevant to SDG 3: Good health and wellbeing - Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages. The platform has been primarily designed to address target 3.4 (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being).  

Medtronic LABS mission is to expand access to healthcare for underserved patients, families, and communities around the world. Through our open-source technology platform and recipe for health systems strengthening, we provide sustainable and localized healthcare solutions that deliver measurable patient outcomes. More information about Medtronic LABS can be found at https://www.medtroniclabs.org.  

SPICE is the first open-source digital platform designed to support a new era of data-driven community healthcare delivery. We go beyond the commonly used data collection tools to ensure that all community-based activities are bi-directionally linked to the health system. Our technology is embedded directly within health systems and government digital ecosystems to transform the way healthcare is delivered. With SPICE, service delivery is driven by data for smarter resource allocation and better health outcomes. 

In addition, the SPICE platform supports SDG 10 (Reduced inequalities) and SDG 17 (partnership for the goals) based on our approach to partnerships and health system strengthening and sustainability within each of our programs.

dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity:
The SPICE platform has implemented the following controls and safeguards to ensure the privacy, security, and integrity of the data collected: 

Process, Policies, and Procedures:
Compliance with international standards such as GDPR & HIPAA 
Regular data access audits completed 
Security governance, risk, and compliance processes in place for organization 

Application Security: 
Data is encrypted in transit 
Data is encrypted at rest 
Authorization required to access patient data with username and password 
Account lock after 5 incorrect password attempts 
Data access is restricted by role type 

Data Privacy:
All data is de-identified prior to landing in data warehouse for anonymized reporting 
Data is fully de-identified prior to sharing with program stakeholders 
Patient consent is required prior to data collection

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

privacy.privacyCompliance:
The SPICE platform enables the collection of PII data such as Name, Age, Location, and Health status information. 

The SPICE platform has been developed to be compliant with both international and country-specific regulations. The SPICE application is compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the system is audited at each release to ensure compliance. The SPICE platform also complies with all country-specific regulations where it operates. For example, in Kenya, SPICE is compliant with the 2019 Kenya Data Protection Act.  

The full list of regulations that SPICE complies with is as follows: 
General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) 
Kenya Data Protection Act, 2019 
Ghana Data Protection Act, 2012 
Tanzania Personal Data Protection Act, 2022
privacy.privacyComplianceURL:
The mobile application privacy policy can be found here: https://spice.docs.medtroniclabs.org/overview/data-privacy-and-security/privacy-policy. The privacy policy is included within the application side-menu for all users to have access to and can be customized by any software developer that would take and use the application for their own purposes.  

We can also provide our registration forms with the Kenyan & Ghanian Data Protection offices where Medtronic LABS is registered as a data processor.
